    public interface PathConverter
extends Converter<java.nio.file.Path>
    Converter that returns the inputted String.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.mihaibojin.props.core.converters.Converter

        encode

    • Method Detail

      • expandUserHomeDir

        boolean expandUserHomeDir()
        If true, ~ will expand to the user's home directory, as returned by System.getProperty("user.home").

      • decode

        default java.nio.file.Path decode​(java.lang.String value)
        Parses the specified input string into a Path.

        This method supports expanding ~ to the user's home directory (as returned by System.getProperty("user.home")), if expandUserHomeDir() returns true.

        This method does NOT support the ~username shorthand (which will incorrectly expand to /path/to/home/usernameusername.

        Specified by:
        decode in interface Converter<java.nio.file.Path>
        Returns:
        the value parsed as T

      • replaceTildeWithUserHomeDir

        static java.lang.String replaceTildeWithUserHomeDir​(java.lang.String path)
        Prefixes the specified path with the user's home directory, if the input starts with ~ .

        It is the caller's responsibility to prevent any edge-cases or bad input (e.g., '~~'); this method will simply replace the first tilda character with the user's home directory.
